description:
Ensho`s past is revealed, and Takasugi revolves to make a final stand to take him down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Agir de manière inhabituelle entraîne des conséquences inhabituelles
Do Something Uncharacteristic, and Something Uncharacteristic Will Happen
Gara ja Nai Koto o Suru to Gara ja Nai Koto ga Okoru
ガラじゃない事をするとガラじゃない事が起こる
